com.ucsf.wear.services

Class StartupService

  • java.lang.Object
    • BroadcastReceiver
      • com.ucsf.core.services.RecurringService
        • com.ucsf.wear.services.StartupService

  • public class StartupService
extends RecurringService
    Service responsible to launch all the services at startup. Check periodically if they are still running.

      • getApplicationTables

        public static DataManager.Table[] getApplicationTables(Context context)
        Returns the tables used by the application. If an error happens, kill the application since those tables are mandatory.
